amendment.description: Amendment deletes $1.5 million in funding for motor vehicle theft prevention programs and inserts $1 million for law enforcement family support programs and $500,000 for motor vehicle theft prevention programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to reduce the $1.5 million in funds appropriated in the bill for Motor Vehicle Theft Prevention Programs by $1 million and reallocate those funds for Law Enforcement Family Support programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoyer amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
